entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy with risk of thundershowers. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
